text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha ao krom robsakhnhom. chaur puok anak brate b tde tam meakra robsa puok anak choh . pitabrakd nasa khnhom ka brate b tde tam meakra robsakhnhom der . haey puok anak kngte nung doeng anak na( khnhom ryy puok anak) del ttuol ban chokchy now thngai barlok noh . pitabrakd nasa puok del bampean ku kmean chychomneah laey
